title: Rob Leota
text:
Rob Leota (born 3 March 1997) is an Australian professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for the <a href="Melbourne%20Rebels">Melbourne Rebels</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> and for in international rugby. His usual position is flanker.
Career.
He made his debut for the Rebels against the <a href="Crusaders%20%28rugby%20union%29">Crusaders</a> as a replacement in a heavy defeat at <a href="Rugby%20League%20Park">AMI Stadium</a>.
Leota was named in 's team for the <a href="2021%20Rugby%20Championship">2021 Rugby Championship</a> match against , played on the <a href="Gold%20Coast%2C%20Queensland">Gold Coast</a>. He made his <a href="Test%20match%20%28rugby%20union%29">test</a> debut in the 74th minute of the match, won 28–26 against the World Cup champions.
